availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas D. Neal (Scott County, Kentucky, farm laborer)

body.p: Scott County, Kentucky, farm laborer. Kentucky native. Son of John C. Neal and Catherine Neal. Married to Sarah Neal. Father of Preston Neal. Farm laborer in Scott County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District 2, p. 503B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District 1, p. 963.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, Big Eagle, p. 213A.
